text: Jérôme Lambert (born June 7, 1957) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Charente department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jérôme Lambert
